p: Table 3 demonstrates the mineral content of PKC. The ratio of calcium to phosphorus and sodium to potassium is low in diets based on PKC. It is necessary to supplement those minerals to meet most animalsâ€™ nutrient requirements [ 42]. PKC is also a better source of Ca, Mn, Zn, and Na than groundnut cake, whereas groundnut cake is a good source for K, Mg, Fe, and P [ 43].
